snippet: The commission on Friday ordered former State Senator Pedro Espada Jr. to pay $80,000 for violating state law by hiring his uncle.
abstract: New York State Legislative Ethics Commission orders former State Senator Pedro Espada Jr to pay $80,000 for violating state law by hiring his uncle Juan A Feliciano Jr; judgment is the largest ever assessed by the commission; Espada is currently on trial in federal court, accused of embezzlement.
lead_paragraph: The commission on Friday ordered former State Senator Pedro Espada Jr. to pay $80,000 for violating state law by hiring his uncle.

headline.seo: Pedro Espada Is Ordered to Pay $80,000 After Hiring Uncle
